lessons.lesson: electron-builder auto-publishes to GitHub when it detects a tag. Set 'publish: null' in config to disable and let workflow handle releases separately.
lessons.evidence: CI failed with 403 when electron-builder tried POST to /releases

lessons.lesson: GitHub Actions release jobs need 'permissions: contents: write' to create releases. Add this to the job that uses softprops/action-gh-release.
lessons.evidence: 403 'Resource not accessible by integration' error on release creation

lessons.lesson: For cross-repo CI with file: dependencies, clone sibling repos and use 'npm install' (not 'npm ci') since lock files may be out of sync.
lessons.evidence: npm ci failed with 'Missing: @types/ws@8.18.1 from lock file'
